name: Help Kuiper
description:
Hi, I'm Kuiper!

I'm a minor planet which has been excluded in all galaxies that exist in T Universe. They say I have to do another thing with my life.

I have taken their advices, so now, I want to create my own Universe.

But it won't be an easy task, so I need your help in order to go throughout T Universe and face difficult missions, in different planets, within several galaxies.

Would you like to come with me?


My creator really appreciates your support to this project.
Expect incredible things :) .











Demo version is available now

This game is in development, so at the moment you can only play one mission. The full game will be out coming soon.



Have fun! And share this videogame

If you have enjoyed this videogame, rate it and share it with your friends,  also you can donate to help me to create more missions and projects!
